meaningMnemonic: The <radical>ladle</radical> radical and the <kanji>ladle</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: You use a <kanji>ladle</kanji> to distribute soup. But as you're ladling you find something odd floating in the soup. It's... a <reading>toe</reading> (と)! You scream, dropping the ladle and the toe on the ground.
